# Sicken Evil (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[Sanctified Spells|Sanctified 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Sacrifice

**Range:** Personal

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius emanation

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC)Â­, pg. 107

You emanate a powerful aura that sickens evil creatures within the specified area.

*Sacrifice:* 1d4 points of Strength damage.
